com.mansoor.uncommon.configuration
Class PropertyConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  com.mansoor.uncommon.configuration.Configuration
      com.mansoor.uncommon.configuration.BaseConfiguration
          com.mansoor.uncommon.configuration.PropertyConfiguration
Direct Known Subclasses:
SystemPropertyConfiguration
public class PropertyConfiguration
extends BaseConfiguration

This Class is a type safe wrapper over Properties class and provides convenient methods to easily manipulate Properties file

Since:
2/9/12
Author:
Muhammad Ashraf
